title: Complaints and Problems
body:
I have been getting LPQ a lot. I understand the need for it, I don't want to decline games or leave them but sometimes I'm forced to. For example, League sometimes glitches and I don't see the "accept" or "decline" button to get into Champ select, I get 20 mins LPQ for not accepting. Sometimes I don't see it after I wait 20 minutes, and I have to wait another 20. Sometimes my connection cuts off and I can't join back into the game if I was in one, I get 20 mins LPQ. I just think it's unfair that I have to sit through 20 mins for unintentionally leaving/declining matches.

Also, I have been trying to make an account for my friend for a while now but it always says "signup failed." I double checked everything, the password meets the requirements, they're the same, has one letter and number, etc. I agreed to the Terms of Uses. I'm not a robot. Username isn't taken. I don't know what could be causing this but it might be what I saw before; they don't support NA users or something like that.

It'd be nice for some help, thanks. This is an amazing game, I love playing it, it's just these problems that make me a little angry.

First off, I **don't recommend** making an account for your friend. If they need to recover the account at a later date, it could be a lot harder for them if they didn't make it themselves. Is there a reason why you want to make an account for your friend or why they cannot make their own account?

As for your issue accepting matches, it sounds like your connection to the server could be unstable, which would prevent the queue notifications from coming up or disconnecting you from champ select. I strongly suggest taking a look at the steps in our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a starting point in resolving this for good.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
